id.description: ID of the person. This is preferably an URI where the person's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/person/s.verhoeven.

contactPersonOf.description: Projects or software that a person is contact person of.

items.description: ID of a project or software, preferably an URI where the project's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/project/emetabolomics

ownerOf.description: Software that a person is the owner of.

items.description: ID of a software package, preferably an URI where the software's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/software/xenon

description.description: Person description, bio and/or CV, in Markdown format underneath Frontmatter (---) in Markdown files

jobTitle.description: The job title of the person (for example, eScience Research Engineer).

schema.description: Fixed property, to validate the JSON object with the current schema.

nlescWebsite.description: Link to the associated page on the NLeSC website (e.g. https://www.esciencecenter.nl/profile/ing.-stefan-verhoeven).
